column2: Buddhism is a religion indigenous to the Indian subcontinent that encompasses a variety of traditions, beliefs and practices largely based on teachings attributed to Siddhartha Gautama, who is commonly known as the Buddha, meaning "the awakened one".
Amidism holds that the faithful—by believing in Amida, hearing or saying his name, or desiring to share in his Western Paradise—can be reborn in the Pure Land.
Shinto teaches that certain deeds create a kind of ritual impurity that one should want cleansed for one's own peace of mind and good fortune rather than because impurity is wrong.
Give a voluntary donation to [Root.Religion.GetName] charities.
column3: Faites un don volontaire aux oeuvres de charité de [Root.Religion.GetName].
column4: Give a voluntary donation to [Root.Religion.GetName] charities.

column2: May my sins be forgiven and my piety increased.
column3: Que mes péchés sont pardonnés et ma piété augmenté.
column4: Möge meine Sünden vergeben werden und meine Frömmigkeit erhöht.
column5: Que mis pecados sean perdonados y mi piedad se incrementaron.
